text: Sorry for the delay Connor, but yes that’s what I’m seeing. And Bradley, good to know let me try that out!

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

:wave: Hi everyone!
New to HubSpot. I need some help with updating the NodeJS HubSpot Client version to v9.0.0 within HubSpot custom code.
Any help would be highly appreciated!
Thank you!

:wave: Hello I am looking for a way to get the API Key of an app which was created by one of old developer who has left the organization, is there a way to get it if I have HubID?
I can see clientSecret, Scopes and everything as a Super Admin but API key can only be accessed from developer console which I can't access.
Any pointers will be of great help.

Hi Everyone, I'm relatively new to HubSpot, I have a blog listing landing page and would like to order the posts in order of the date of the Tradeshow Event in the title. Is this possible? Link attached Thank you
Each Article has this date parameter in the style: `style="order:20200219;"` that can be targeted to change the order
I played a little with it and was able to change the order:

Hello Guys,
Can we convert a global module to local module after a module a created. If yes, please guide me

Hi, Everyone.
I want your help to understand how HubSpot is storing the contact details? In detail, I am using HubSpot for the other application that stores the contact details. now I want to integrate with a new application with the same HubSpot account. but the problem is in the new application I am using encryption to encrypt all of the contact details. we can not see the contact details as they are in the encrypted form. so I need your help to store contact details. so it will help our CRM. Please help me to resolve the issue. Thanks in advance.
